desc: Self clean are the UK distributor for Nanospetic antimicrobial touch points, skins, mats and handles. The Purezone disinfection service reduces cross contamination and the spread of infection, creating cleaner, healthier environments in turn reducing sickness and virus for example coronavirus, Covid-19, MRSA and E-coli

layout.text:
Our products help reduce the spread and cross contamination of germs, viruses, bugs and illnesses, helping to create a cleaner and healthier environment for you, your family and you employees.
We are proud to be the leader in antimicrobial protection.
